## Purpose
Abstract base class system for displaying paginated content, with concrete implementation using system's default pager via pydoc.

## Core Components

**Pager (L5-14)** - Abstract base class defining the pager interface
- `show(content: str)` (L9-14) - Abstract method requiring implementation for content display

**SystemPager (L17-25)** - Concrete implementation using system pager
- `_pager(content: str)` (L20-21) - Private method wrapping pydoc.pager() with dynamic import
- `show(content: str)` (L23-25) - Public interface implementation delegating to _pager

## Dependencies
- `abc.ABC, abstractmethod` - For abstract base class pattern
- `typing.Any` - Type annotation for pydoc return value
- `pydoc.pager` - System pager functionality (dynamically imported)

## Architecture
Uses classic abstract base class pattern with single concrete implementation. Dynamic import of pydoc avoids import-time dependencies.

## Test/Demo Code (L28-34)
Standalone execution creates console pager demo using rich console with test card content. Imports from sibling modules (`.__main__`, `.console`).

## Usage Pattern
Instantiate SystemPager and call show() with string content for paginated display using system's configured pager.
